member.name: T:EPiServer.XForms.DataTypes
member.summary: Used to validate input to XForm input controls.

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.DataTypes.Validate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates a value against a give type.
member.param: The type to validate against.
The string to validate.
member.returns: True if the input is valid, false otherwise.
member.remarks: A null value or String.Empty will always return true. If the type is not registrered in the Types property the return value will always be true.

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.DataTypes.ValidateDefaultTypedData(System.String)
member.summary: Validates a string value against a regular expression created using InvalidDefaultInputRegex.
member.param: The string to validate.
member.returns: True if the input is valid, false otherwise.
member.remarks: A null value or String.Empty will always return true.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.DataTypes.Types
member.summary: A Hashtable containing the available types for input fields. Every type corresponds to a regular expression that is used to validate input data.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.DataTypes.InvalidDefaultInputRegex
member.summary: A string representing an regular expression that is used when validating input data that does not have a type specified.
member.remarks: Any data that has no type specified will be validated against this expression. If the expression results in a match the value will consider not valid. Default value is "<>"

member.name: T:EPiServer.XForms.Implementation.EMailConnection
member.summary: This class supports the EPiServer infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Used to send e-mail for XForms when specified by an editor.

member.name: T:EPiServer.XForms.Implementation.HttpConnection
member.summary: This class supports the EPiServer infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Used to re-post XForms to another URL when specified by an editor.

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.TranslateEventArgs.GetTranslatedText
member.summary: Gets the translated text. If no text has been translated the untranslated text will be returned.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.TranslateEventArgs.TextToTranslate
member.summary: Gets the translation search path, for instance "/xform/requiredfield/inlineerrormessage".

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.TranslateEventArgs.TranslatedText
member.summary: Gets or sets the translated text.

member.name: T:EPiServer.XForms.Util.XFormConvert
member.summary: Used to convert XHTML to an XForm.

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.Util.XFormConvert.Parse(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Transform the content of an XmlDocument to a string representation of an XForm.
member.param: The XmlDocument to parse.
If set to true, form elements that have the same name, no name or names including invalid characters will be corrected. Otherwise an exception will be thrown for invalid names.
member.returns: A string representation of an XForm.

member.summary: Transform the content of an XmlDocument to a string representation of an XForm.

member.returns: A string representation of an XForm.

The form element that we want to create an instance nodes for.

member.returns: The instance node for the given name.

The instance entry.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.Util.XFormDataEventArgs.FormData
member.summary: The actual form data that is being posted.
member.remarks: This can be used to validate posted data or to add custom data.
member.example: An example of how to set a custom value for form data. e.FormData.SetValue("mycustomvalue", "12345");

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.Util.XFormDataEventArgs.CancelSubmit
member.summary: Set this value if you want to cancel the form posting. The submission is automatically cancelled if any ErrorMessages has been added to the Event Arguments but it is possible to cancel the post without giving an error message. This can be handy if you want to implement custom logic to how to store or send the form data.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.Util.XFormDataEventArgs.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Used to set an custom error message if you validate data yourself in the event.
member.value: A string containing either the last ErrorMessage or String.Empty if no ErrorMessage has been added.
member.remarks: This will add a string to the ErrorMessages property. It is possible to add several Error Messages by simply setting this property more than once.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.Util.XFormDataEventArgs.ErrorMessages
member.summary: Returns an Array of Strings containing all ErrorMessages for the event arguments.
member.value: An Array of String objects. If no messages have been added an empty Array will be returned.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.Select1.Appearence
member.summary: A property that is usd to determine how the control should be rendered. When set to RenderType.Minimal the control will be rendered as a html select and when set to RenderType.Full to html radio buttons.
member.remarks: Will default to RenderType.Minimal.

member.summary: The action that should be triggered when the submit control triggers a form posting.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.Submit.CustomContent
member.summary: If custom content is specified the control will render an anchor tag with postback behaviour. The value of the CustomContent property will be rendered inside of the anchor tag.
member.remarks: For instance, the value could be an image:

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.Submit.ChannelOptions
member.summary: The ChannelOptions that is used when calling XFormControl.SubmitForm.

member.summary: The email address that is used as the sender of an email.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.Submit.Subject
member.summary: A custom subject for an email message. If this is not set the subject defined on the form is used.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.Submit.ActionSettings
member.summary: A collection of name/values that are parsed from the value of the Action property.
member.remarks: The parsing is basically the same as the query string for a url.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.Submit.RegexMatchString
member.summary: A string representation of a regular expression that is used when converting html to xform controls.

member.summary: The main class for a XForm.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.DataBind
member.summary: Creates the child controls from the XForm representation.

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.SetupFormControls(System.Web.UI.ControlCollection)
member.summary: Adds all parsed controls from the form definition to the Controls collection. Also adds validators for the form fields.
member.param: A collection of controls for the form.

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.ClearEventHandlers
member.summary: Clears all events from the event handlers.

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.ExtractXFormControls
member.summary: Extracts all the xform input controls from the form.
member.returns: An ArrayList containing all xform controls
member.remarks: Submit controls are also returned. This method has to be called after the ControlsCreated event.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.FormDefinition
member.summary: The definition for the form.

member.name: E:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.BeforeReadingPostedData
member.summary: EventHandler that is triggered before reading and validating posted data. If an event listener sets CancelSubmit=true an Static Validator with the ErrorMessage will be added to the page and the form does not continue reading and validating input values.

member.name: E:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.BeforeLoadingForm
member.summary: This event is triggered when loading the form before the form controls are parsed.

member.name: E:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.ControlsCreated
member.summary: Occurs when the child controls has been created.

member.name: E:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.BeforeSubmitPostedData
member.summary: EventHandler that is called after the values have been read and validated but before the form is submitted. This is the last chance to stop the form from being submitted.
member.remarks: This event will be triggered even if the posted data is not valid. If you want to add logic when posting data you might want to check if the page is valid (see ).

member.name: E:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.AfterSubmitPostedData
member.summary: EventHandler that is triggered after the control has validated and sent it's data.

member.name: E:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.ControlSetup
member.summary: Static event that is triggered every time a is created.
member.remarks: This event can be used to attach to other events for the control where you do not have access to the actual control. This can for instance be the case when a form is loaded through dynamic content.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.FormID
member.summary: The id of the XForm.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.EditMode
member.summary: Used to determine if controls should render themselves in edit mode.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.Data
member.summary: A reference to the XFormData that the form is submitted to.
member.remarks: If not set FormDefinition.CreateFormData() will be called to create a new XFormData for the form. If this property has been set when the controls are rendered the values from the form data will be loaded.

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.ValidationGroup
member.summary: Gets or sets the validation group.
member.value: The validation group. Default is String.Empty

member.name: P:EPiServer.XForms.WebControls.XFormControl.EnableClientScript
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client validation scripts are enabled.
member.value: true if client validation scripts are enabled; otherwise, false. Default is true.

member.summary: Summary description for ListItemControlBuilder.

member.summary: Summary description for ListItemControlBuilder.

member.name: T:EPiServer.XForms.XForm
member.summary: Main class for the XForms functionality.
member.remarks:
This class holds the XForm and its metadata. It also provides the functionality to Load and save it to the datalayer. The form is stored as a serialized XML document on the form:
<root> <model> <instance> [instance values] </instance> </model> [Xform controls and HTML] </root>
member.example: The contents of the sample XForm "Vote"

member.name: M:EPiServer.XForms.XForm.GetStore
member.summary: Returns the DynamicDataStore for the XForms definition store
member.returns: A instance or null if the store does not exist

member.name: T:EPiServer.XForms.XFormFolder
member.summary:
The XFormFolder is a class to handle the structure of XForms objects in the Dynamic Data Store. A XFormFolder has a path separated by / and has a structure like:
/ XFormFolder/ XFormFolder/ XForm ... XForm
